t: Mark 13
And*p as he went out of the temple, one of his disciples saith unto him, Master, see what manner of stones and what buildings are here!
And*p Jesus answering said unto him, Seest*r thou*r these*r great*r buildings?*r there*r shall*r not*r be*r left*r one*r stone*r upon*r another,*r that*r shall*r not*r be*r thrown*r down.*r
And*p as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple, Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately,
Tell*p us, when shall these things be? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled?
And*p Jesus answering them began to say, Take*r heed*r lest*r any*r man*r deceive*r you:*r
For*rp many*r shall*r come*r in*r my*r name,*r saying,*r I*r am*r Christ;*r and*r shall*r deceive*r many.*r
And*rp when*r ye*r shall*r hear*r of*r wars*r and*r rumours*r of*r wars,*r be*r ye*r not*r troubled:*r for*r such*r things*r must*r needs*r be;*r but*r the*r end*r shall*r not*r be*r yet.*r

For*rp nation*r shall*r rise*r against*r nation,*r and*r kingdom*r against*r kingdom:*r and*r there*r shall*r be*r earthquakes*r in*r divers*r places,*r and*r there*r shall*r be*r famines*r and*r troubles:*r these*r are*r the*r beginnings*r of*r sorrows.*r

But*rp take*r heed*r to*r yourselves:*r for*r they*r shall*r deliver*r you*r up*r to*r councils;*r and*r in*r the*r synagogues*r ye*r shall*r be*r beaten:*r and*r ye*r shall*r be*r brought*r before*r rulers*r and*r kings*r for*r my*r sake,*r for*r a*r testimony*r against*r them.*r
And*rp the*r gospel*r must*r first*r be*r published*r among*r all*r nations.*r

But*rp when*r they*r shall*r lead*r you,*r and*r deliver*r you*r up,*r take*r no*r thought*r beforehand*r what*r ye*r shall*r speak,*r neither*r do*r ye*r premeditate:*r but*r whatsoever*r shall*r be*r given*r you*r in*r that*r hour,*r that*r speak*r ye:*r for*r it*r is*r not*r ye*r that*r speak,*r but*r the*r Holy*r Ghost.*r

Now*rp the*r brother*r shall*r betray*r the*r brother*r to*r death,*r and*r the*r father*r the*r son;*r and*r children*r shall*r rise*r up*r against*r their*r parents,*r and*r shall*r cause*r them*r to*r be*r put*r to*r death.*r
And*rp ye*r shall*r be*r hated*r of*r all*r men*r for*r my*r name's*r sake:*r but*r he*r that*r shall*r endure*r unto*r the*r end,*r the*r same*r shall*r be*r saved.*r

But*rp when*r ye*r shall*r see*r the*r abomination*r of*r desolation,*r spoken*r of*r by*r Daniel*r the*r prophet,*r standing*r where*r it*r ought*r not,*r (let him that readeth understand,) then*r let*r them*r that*r be*r in*r Judaea*r flee*r to*r the*r mountains:*r
And*rp let*r him*r that*r is*r on*r the*r housetop*r not*r go*r down*r into*r the*r house,*r neither*r enter*r therein,*r to*r take*r any*r thing*r out*r of*r his*r house:*r
And*rp let*r him*r that*r is*r in*r the*r field*r not*r turn*r back*r again*r for*r to*r take*r up*r his*r garment.*r
But*rp woe*r to*r them*r that*r are*r with*r child,*r and*r to*r them*r that*r give*r suck*r in*r those*r days!*r
And*rp pray*r ye*r that*r your*r flight*r be*r not*r in*r the*r winter.*r
For*rp in*r those*r days*r shall*r be*r affliction,*r such*r as*r was*r not*r from*r the*r beginning*r of*r the*r creation*r which*r God*r created*r unto*r this*r time,*r neither*r shall*r be.*r

And*rp except*r that*r the*r Lord*r had*r shortened*r those*r days,*r no*r flesh*r should*r be*r saved:*r but*r for*r the*r elect's*r sake,*r whom*r he*r hath*r chosen,*r he*r hath*r shortened*r the*r days.*r
And*rp then*r if*r any*r man*r shall*r say*r to*r you,*r Lo,*r here*r is*r Christ;*r or,*r lo,*r he*r is*r there;*r believe*r him*r not:*r
For*rp false*r Christs*r and*r false*r prophets*r shall*r rise,*r and*r shall*r shew*r signs*r and*r wonders,*r to*r seduce,*r if*r it*r were*r possible,*r even*r the*r elect.*r
But*rp take*r ye*r heed:*r behold,*r I*r have*r foretold*r you*r all*r things.*r
But*rp in*r those*r days,*r after*r that*r tribulation,*r the*r sun*r shall*r be*r darkened,*r and*r the*r moon*r shall*r not*r give*r her*r light,*r
And*rp the*r stars*r of*r heaven*r shall*r fall,*r and*r the*r powers*r that*r are*r in*r heaven*r shall*r be*r shaken.*r
And*rp then*r shall*r they*r see*r the*r Son*r of*r man*r coming*r in*r the*r clouds*r with*r great*r power*r and*r glory.*r

And*rp then*r shall*r he*r send*r his*r angels,*r and*r shall*r gather*r together*r his*r elect*r from*r the*r four*r winds,*r from*r the*r uttermost*r part*r of*r the*r earth*r to*r the*r uttermost*r part*r of*r heaven.*r
Now*rp learn*r a*r parable*r of*r the*r fig*r tree;*r When*r her*r branch*r is*r yet*r tender,*r and*r putteth*r forth*r leaves,*r ye*r know*r that*r summer*r is*r near:*r
So*rp ye*r in*r like*r manner,*r when*r ye*r shall*r see*r these*r things*r come*r to*r pass,*r know*r that*r it*r is*r nigh,*r even*r at*r the*r doors.*r
Verily*rp I*r say*r unto*r you,*r that*r this*r generation*r shall*r not*r pass,*r till*r all*r these*r things*r be*r done.*r
Heaven*rp and*r earth*r shall*r pass*r away:*r but*r my*r words*r shall*r not*r pass*r away.*r
But*rp of*r that*r day*r and*r that*r hour*r knoweth*r no*r man,*r no,*r not*r the*r angels*r which*r are*r in*r heaven,*r neither*r the*r Son,*r but*r the*r Father.*r
Take*rp ye*r heed,*r watch*r and*r pray:*r for*r ye*r know*r not*r when*r the*r time*r is.*r

For*rp the*r Son*r of*r man*r is*r as*r a*r man*r taking*r a*r far*r journey,*r who*r left*r his*r house,*r and*r gave*r authority*r to*r his*r servants,*r and*r to*r every*r man*r his*r work,*r and*r commanded*r the*r porter*r to*r watch.*r
Watch*rp ye*r therefore:*r for*r ye*r know*r not*r when*r the*r master*r of*r the*r house*r cometh,*r at*r even,*r or*r at*r midnight,*r or*r at*r the*r cockcrowing,*r or*r in*r the*r morning:*r
Lest*rp coming*r suddenly*r he*r find*r you*r sleeping.*r
And*rp what*r I*r say*r unto*r you*r I*r say*r unto*r all,*r Watch.*r
